Deepstate reports that Russia carried out a series of mechanised assaults in the Orikhiv direction, western Zaporizhzhia Oblast, today.   They stated that Russian forces, using tanks, BMPs, BTRs, and infantry attacked on four assault vectors towards Mala Tokmachka‚Ä¶

Update: A Russian channel with connections on the frontline claims that Russian soldiers entered Novodanylivka (south of Orikhiv).
Keep in mind, all previous Russian attempts to gain a foothold in the village have failed, but this attack does seem to be much larger.
Kharkiv city is currently under a large-scale attack from Russian KAB glide-bombs. At least five impacts so far. Reports state that they are targeting the TEC-5 Power Plant (49.97073, 36.10046).
Kharkiv city is currently under a large-scale attack from Russian KAB glide-bombs. At least five impacts so far. Reports state that they are targeting the TEC-5 Power Plant (49.97073, 36.10046).
Kharkiv city is currently under a large-scale attack from Russian KAB glide-bombs. At least five impacts so far. Reports state that they are targeting the TEC-5 Power Plant (49.97073, 36.10046).
A secondary target has also been hit. 4 KABs impacted the power plant, and 4 others impacted something else. The KABs have been launched in two waves so far, 2 hitting each target at a time.
High threat of Iskander launches from Kursk
Iskander on Richky, Sumy Oblast
Two missiles were detected, both S-300 air defence missiles. No Iskander threat.
Three S-300 missiles (ground-to-ground) struck the Bilopillya area in Sumy Oblast
A Su-34 is flying to the launch lines in Kherson Oblast from Dzhankoi, Crimea. KAB launches to Ukrainian-controlled Kherson Oblast are expected in the next 15 minutes.
Three S-300 missiles (ground-to-ground) struck the Bilopillya area in Sumy Oblast
Bilopillya District continues to be shelled by S-300s. 2+ more impacts.
A Su-34 is flying to the launch lines in Kherson Oblast from Dzhankoi, Crimea. KAB launches to Ukrainian-controlled Kherson Oblast are expected in the next 15 minutes.
The combat mission was cancelled for some reason. 5 (!) Su-34s flew to the launch lines northwest of Chaplynka, Kherson Oblast, and made a return flight to Crimea.

Kherson City is currently under attack from Russian Geran-2 drones. At least four impacts have been recorded in the Tavriya District. 
1 reconnaissance drone is operating over the Dnipro River, opposite Korobelnyi Island.
The combat mission was cancelled for some reason. 5 (!) Su-34s flew to the launch lines northwest of Chaplynka, Kherson Oblast, and made a return flight to Crimea.
The 5 Su-34s flew something like this while the Gerans were striking Kherson. Very weird.
The 5 Su-34s flew something like this while the Gerans were striking Kherson. Very weird.
Also there were no Su-35 escorts for some reason.

Regarding the Geran-2 drone strikes on Kherson, here are some videos showing the impacts. Ukrainian air defence in the city attempted to shoot them down but was ineffective. The target was something in the Tavriya District, but I'm not sure exactly what. It doesn't seem to be energy-related.
More Gerans were launched from Hvardiiske Training Ground in Crimea earlier. They may also strike Kherson in the coming hours.

Regarding the Geran-2 drone strikes on Kherson, here are some videos showing the impacts. Ukrainian air defence in the city attempted to shoot them down but was ineffective. The target was something in the Tavriya District, but I'm not sure exactly what. It doesn't seem to be energy-related.
More Gerans were launched from Hvardiiske Training Ground in Crimea earlier. They may also strike Kherson in the coming hours.
Kharkiv city is currently under a large-scale attack from Russian KAB glide-bombs. At least five impacts so far. Reports state that they are targeting the TEC-5 Power Plant (49.97073, 36.10046).
Correction: Only one KAB targeted the power plant. 3-4 others hit something outside the city limits, while 3 more were shot down by air defence missiles.
Earlier, the Honcharivske Training Ground in Chernihiv Oblast was targeted by two Russian Iskander-M ballistic missiles. Now, at least 10 Geran-2 drones are flying in its direction.
Military Situation In Ukraine On October 21, 2025 (Maps Update)
Military Situation In Ukraine On October 21, 2025 (Maps Update)

Russian Army Advances Deep In Kupyansk And Other Parts Of Kharkiv (Videos)
On October 21, the Russian military advanced in several areas in the Kharkiv direction, most notably in the city of Kupyansk, despite facing resistance from Kiev forces.
The Sever [North] Group of Forces expanded its control in Vovchansk, capturing new territories to the west of the settlement. Russian troops reached Synelnykove, with preliminary reports indicating that the settlement was being stormed.
Moving more to the south in Kharkiv, the Zapad [West] Group of Forces made additional gains in Kupyansk. Russian troops advanced some one kilometer into the southern part of the city, reaching the Yubileyny neighborhood and capturing some high-rise buildings there.
Read more 
HERE

On October 21, the Russian military advanced in several areas in the Kharkiv direction, most notably in the city of Kupyansk, despite facing resistance from Kiev forces.
The Sever [North] Group of Forces expanded its control in Vovchansk, capturing new territories to the west of the settlement. Russian troops reached Synelnykove, with preliminary reports indicating that the settlement was being stormed.
Moving more to the south in Kharkiv, the Zapad [West] Group of Forces made additional gains in Kupyansk. Russian troops advanced some one kilometer into the southern part of the city, reaching the Yubileyny neighborhood and capturing some high-rise buildings there.

Continued Exchange Of Strikes Against A Backdrop Of Diplomatic Deadlock
On October 20-21, the Russian armed forces carried out massive strikes on Ukrainian military and critical infrastructure objects. The attacks targeted energy and transportation hubs supporting the AFU, warehouses housing strike drones, and temporary deployment points for Ukrainian units and foreign mercenaries. In Kharkiv, a hit by a long-range air-dropped bomb was recorded, which aligns with reports of Russia ramping up the industrial production of such munitions.
Against this backdrop, according to some experts, the rhetoric of several European leaders and Ukrainian President Zelensky, who formally support the idea of a ceasefire across the entire front line, in practice suggests the opposite. Their statements about the inevitable tightening of sanctions against Russia following any truce are interpreted as an attempt to reduce the already low likelihood of Vladimir Putin agreeing to such a step...

DEEP STRIKES AND STRATEGIC ENCIRCLEMENT: POLTAVA BOMBING AND THE IMPENDING SIEGE OF POKROVSK

The Capture Of Malaya Tokmachka: Russia‚Äôs 58th Army Expands Its Bridgehead In Zaporozhye
Russian units in Pokrovsk have cut off the M-30 highway near the industrial zone. The 58th Army has established control over a significant portion of Malaya Tokmachka. 
The EU and Ukraine are developing a 12-point conflict resolution plan.
